cell-methods: Error: depth: longitude: sum where sea (along a zig-zag grid path spanning a basin)  time: mean not found in cell methods, please register
description: CMIP5 called this "due to Bolus Advection".  Name change respects the more general physics of the mesoscale parameterizations.
ui-label: Ocean Meridional Overturning Mass Streamfunction Due to Parameterized Mesoscale Advection
